Marsha N. HONDA, Appellant,
v.
The SALVATION ARMY, A Religious Corporation; Siobhan Moore, Managing Employee of The Salvation Army; Does 1-20, inclusive, Appellees. No. 1D16-3853 District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District. April 6, 2018

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
